long-term-strategy.original: Migrate to newer JPX versions or to a format that shares the essential and distinguishing characteristics of the JPX specification.

short-term-actions.action: Recommend that JPX depositors validate their JPX files using JHOVE (http://hul.harvard.edu/jhove/) or another JPX validator before depositing them for ingest into the archive. Ideally depositors should validate their JPX files to test their JPX creation software before choosing their software.
